document.heading: Hazardous Waste Management Amendments Act of 1984

history.narrative: Law 5-103, the “Hazardous Waste Management Amendments Act of 1984,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-381, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 30, 1984, and May 15, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 6, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-144 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
